Hannah Afriyie (amụrụ na 21 Disemba 1951) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke Ghana lara ezumike nká
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ na 100 na 200 mita sprints na 1978 All-Africa Games nke emere na Algiers.
Afriyie ruru nkeji iri na ise nke 100 mita na 200 mita na 1972 Summer Olympics.
N'egwuregwu West Africa nke 1977 na Lagos, ọ meriri ọlaọcha na mita 100.
